Aegis Sigil.name: Aegis Sigil
Aegis Sigil.flavor: You etch the air with sigils of power. The runes linger for a moment and then burn into a struck foe.
Aegis Sigil.effect: Until the end of the target’s next turn, it is marked by your aegis of shielding. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your aegis of shielding.

Sigil of Safety.name: Sigil of Safety
Sigil of Safety.flavor: Just as your ally is about to suffer a blow, you carve a few quick runes in the air and transport the ally out of harm’s way.
Sigil of Safety.trigger: An attack hits an ally within 5 squares of you
Sigil of Safety.effect: You teleport the target to a space within 5 squares of you. The target gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.

Sigil of Enmity.name: Sigil of Enmity
Sigil of Enmity.flavor: Your rune-enhanced weapon strike marks a foe as the nemesis of you and your allies, making attacks against it more potent.
Sigil of Enmity.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any of your allies hits the target with a melee attack during his or her turn, the attack deals 2d6 extra damage.
